start.name: Tazer
text: Beep boop? (Page 1/2)
zzzzz.... Wha?... Oh, what's up? (Page 1/2)
Can you believe the prices of gas these days? It cost me 2000 coins just to fill up the gas tank on my Mini Bus! (Page 1/2)
Am I finally out of detention? Oh, you're not the principal. What do you want? (Page 1/2)
choices: Do you know about the gas station over there?
How long have you been here for?

start2.name: Tazer
text: Beep boop? (Page 2/2)
zzzzz.... Wha?... Oh, what's up? (Page 2/2)
Can you believe the prices of gas these days? It cost me 2000 coins just to fill up the gas tank on my Mini Bus! (Page 2/2)
Am I finally out of detention? Oh, you're not the principal. What do you want? (Page 2/2)
choices: <font color='#ff00af'>I'm back, and I have your RAM.</font>
Only appears if the player has the ram stick

optA1a.name: Tazer
text: Oh, that place? Don't know much about it, but I drove my Mini-Bus around in there a few days ago and got kicked out. They said something like..

optA1b.name: Disc
text: Stop driving your Mini-Bus around in places it's not supposed to be in!

optA1c.name: Green
text: I swear to God, I'm gonna lose it if I have to clean up your skid marks again! You gotta go!

optA1d.name: Tazer
text: But driving is fun..!

optA2.name: Tazer
text: I don't know, like, probably a few hours. I think...

optA3.name: Tazer
text: I drove my Mini-Bus inside the school, and one of the teachers caught me and confiscated it.

talk.name: Tazer
text: If you really want to.
Well, uh. Not really sure what to talk about, but i suppose we could chat.

varA1a.name: System
text: Would you like a random variant or to select a variant?

varA1b.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select?
choices: "I've been researching a lot about unusual places lately. Apparently..."
"This is the most bogus way to spend my free time, honestly..."
"I've been modifying the heck out of my Mini Bus lately...."
"I saw some dude jumping around with some sort of rocket launcher made of cones a while ago..."
"I'm a bit hungry. How about if you can find a stick of RAM and bring it back to me..."

talkA1B1.name: Tazer
text: I've been researching a lot about unusual places lately. Apparently, there's this place called 'The Backwalls'. Not sure if this is real, but i really want to explore around there if it is. Apparently, there's this tall shadow figure that chases you if you aren't careful, though. Hopefully they aren't too common.

talkA1B2.name: Tazer
text: This is the most bogus way to spend my free time, honestly. The teachers here are so strict about 'No driving Mini Buses on campus!' but I never see them enfore the that rule on anyone else! It makes sense that I'm the only one who gets in trouble for it.

talkA1B3a.name: Tazer
text: I've been modifying the heck out of my Mini Bus lately. I hope the principal doesn't take it away for too long. I just got it a few days ago, and I've already started to get pretty attached to it.
choices: Why not just sneak it out and drive away?

talkA1B3b.name: Tazer
text: If I wasn't being watched by the teachers so closely, don't you think I would have already DONE that by now?

talkA1B4.name: Tazer
text: I saw some dude jumping around with some sort of rocket launcher made of cones a while ago. Not sure how it works, but if I were you, I wouldn't make them angry.

talkA1B5.name: Tazer
text: With kind regards, from Tazer.
The player is then flung

talkA1B6a.name: Tazer
text: I'm a bit hungry. How about if you can find a stick of RAM and bring it back to me, I can give you... How about 2 Driver Rep and 200 Coins in return?
choices: There's no way you said it unironically.
Only appears if the player has the ram stick

ramA1.name: Tazer
text: Wait, really? Thanks! Here's that reward I promised.
The player is then given 2 Driver Rep and 200 Coins.
Here's your stuff, now get lost! Haha just kidding! Feel free to talk to me again sometime.
The player is then given 2 Driver Rep and 200 Coins.
Here's your stuff, now get lost!
The player is then given 2 Driver Rep and 200 Coins.

talkA1B6b.name: Tazer
text: Yeah, what's it to you? Do you want the reward or not?

talkA1B6c.name: Tazer
text: Cool. I don't know where you'd find one, though. Maybe Zeon has one?

talkA1B6e.name: Tazer
text: Awesome. I don't know where you'd find some though. Maybe Zeon has a stick?

varA2a.name: System
text: Would you like a random condition or to select a condition?

varA2b.name: System
text: Which condition would you like to select?
choices: If the player has RAM Stick
If the player has Illegal RAM Stick
If the player has already given Tazer the RAM stick while on cooldown
Only happens in Private Servers, cooldown is 1 hour.
If the player has already given Tazer the RAM stick in the same event

ramA2.name: Tazer
text: Wait, really? Hey, wait a second.. This RAM is unmarked! Bootleg! Are you trying to scam me? Well, this'll be the last scam you'll ever pull.
The player then explodes.

ramA3.name: Tazer
text: Uhh.. I kinda feel like I've done this before.. I don't really feel that hungry anymore..
Ehhhh... I'm kind of feeling a bit spooked right now. I have a big sense of like, deja vu.. Maybe next time..

ramA4.name: Tazer
text: Ehhhh, I'm pretty full, but thanks anyway.

nvm.name: Tazer
text: Then stop wasting my time.
Cya then.
Bruh...
With regards from Tazer...
The player is then flung
Tazer jumpscare
The player is then killed by Tazer "Jumpscaring"
